revisionDesc.change: moved notes to external notes file and added pts
Proofreading Corrections: Heyde dates and Silent Proof
Proofreading corrections, date annotation, header revision, and Bucke as hand
corrected date format in title; added call no., annotations

body.p:
i have just got your letter with 2 dol dollars and the paper i have not read it yet but shall this afternoon i had to write to tell you what i had done i couldent couldn't feel contented till i did well i havent haven't committed any crime but i have spent the money order you sent me for something i have always wanted but never was able to get well i have got a lounge it was quite cheap and good hair cloth but after i got it i thought i hadent hadn't ought to spent the money but now i have told you i shall feel better but i have
got a little money left besides the 2 dolrs dollars you sent me to day i thought i would be saving and george was gone so i would get it so walt i can get along if you send me about 2 dollars next week

i am glad you are going to have new cloths clothes i dont see how you doo do to make your cloths clothes last so long georg is getting somethings every month) i gess guess this is the last peice of furniture i shall get i always wanted a lounge now i have got one i had a letter from Jeff i beleeve believe i told you Davis was here tuesday Tuesday evening and he and Baynton his partner in Jersey is to come here this afternoon that is the cause of my not reading the paper

i have been baking some bread and cake as davis goes away to night so i thought he would probably stay to tea i seem to have quite a number call to see me among the number was Ellen vanwyckEllen Van Wycke she says she liked you and would like to see you she is quite out of health she stayed and had a cup of tea) ann vanwyk Ann Van Wycke sister Ester i dont don't think you ever saw her she married a man by the name of J baylis he had a farm when they were married but drinked and sported it all away and they now live here in great poverty he has been in the hospitallhospital he got drunk and was took to the station house and he tryed tried to cut his throat but dident didn't succeed

John vanwy Van Wyck helps her i beleeve believe but so it is every one has their troubles) you go i see walt to mrs Borroughs yet how does mrs OconorO'Connor and she get along mrs Oconor O'Connor thought they would not perhaps i told her she must doo like mrs blackBlack when the woman up stairs said she woulden wouldn't live with children mrs black told her they would get along nicely)

george and i was talking about if the impeachment was carried if it would make any change with you we thought speed Speed would be the one that would take the place of stansburyStanbery) doo do you know walt i have always felt a kind of sadness when i read the articles of impeac impeachment not but what i always thought he was bad but there is so many things to be considered) i sent and got the sun Sun to see how the election went

postscript.p: my love to mrs and mr Oconor O'Connor and mrs and mr Borroughs
